help.about:
{{- botname}} is a bot with focous on moderation, utility, server management, and much more!
My prefix in this server is: `{{- prefix }}`! To change it, use the **{{- prefix }}prefix <prefix>** command.
To see my commands, type **{{- prefix }}help <module>**
help.commandUndefined: This command does not exist or is disabled

prefix.multiCharacters: My new prefix can\'t have more than 10 characters!
prefix.sucess: My prefix on this server has been changed to: `{{- prefix }}`
prefix.failed:
Sadly, something wen't wrong while trying to update the servers prefix!
Please, try again later.

servericon.description: Click [here]({{- icon }}) to download the icon!

createemoji.noNameLink: You either didn't specify the link of the emoji or the name of it.
createemoji.nameTooBig: The name for the emoji you provided was too big.
createemoji.nameTooShort: The name for the emoji you provided was too short.
createemoji.invalidName: Please, note that the emoji name can only have letters, numbers or underscores.
createemoji.invalidURL: The URL you provided was not a valid url.
createemoji.error: There was an error when creating the emoji.

clear.invalidValue: Please, give a value between 2 and 100!
clear.deleted: {{- amt }} messages have been deleted by {{- auth }}.
